data.description: A Career at HARMANAs a technology leader that is rapidly on the move, HARMAN is filled with people who are focused on making life better. Innovation, inclusivity and teamwork are a part of our DNA. When you add that to the challenges we take on and solve together, you’ll discover that at HARMAN you can grow, make a difference and be proud of the work you do every day.Introduction: A Career at HARMAN AutomotiveWe’re a global, multi-disciplinary team that’s putting the innovative power of technology to work and transforming tomorrow. At HARMAN Automotive, we give you the keys to fast-track your career.Engineer audio systems and integrated technology platforms that augment the driving experienceCombine ingenuity, in-depth research, and a spirit of collaboration with design and engineering excellenceAdvance in-vehicle infotainment, safety, efficiency, and enjoymentAbout the RoleThe Experiential R&D Department is seeking an intern for the responsibility of assisting the data analysis and reporting of automotive audio evaluation results on sound quality and technology features. We conduct controlled listening tests to measure the sound quality of Harman’s automotive audio systems and other technologies.  The resulting data is utilized to establish performance targets and assist Engineering & Product Development with system optimization. What You Will DoAssist with the analysis and creation of Experiential R&D reports and data requests Provide support for testing, data entry, and database maintenance Support global data needs by developing dashboards for common requests Integrate objective data with subjective feedback to mine for insights Support ML/AI development activities and feature development Work alongside teammates in Germany, Japan, India and China toward a common goal and maintain a global database. What You Need to Be SuccessfulMust have taken courses in or closely related to Management Information Systems (MIS), Data Science, Computer Science/Engineering, Object-Oriented Programming, Mobile App Development, Information Visualization, Database Development, Advanced Mathematics, and/or Statistics. Must have strong oral and written communication skills and be able to confidently interact with and present information to senior leaders and executives Must work collaboratively with strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills Experience with Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) Experience with Python, Machine Learning, Big Data Structures Results orientated mindset Bonus Points if You Have Demonstrated experience leading projects to completion Interest in the audio or automotive industry Experience with Qlik, Snowflake, AWS, S3, Databricks, Matillion. Network Programming & Socket Proficiency in TCP/UDP socket programming, WebSockets, or similar network communication protocols. Programming Languages & Frameworks Proficiency in one or more high-level languages (e.g., C++, C#, Java, Python, Go, Rust) used for networked applications. What Makes You EligibleMust be currently enrolled in a realted Bachelor's Degree program or higher at an accredited institution having completed your Sophomore year or later, taking at least one class in the semester/quarter before participation in the internship program, and returning to school for at least one semester upon completion of the internship programMust have a cumulative 3.0 GPABe willing to work in an office in Novi, Michigan.Able to provide your own housing and transportation to/from work.Must possess unrestricted work authorization.Successfully complete a background investigation and drug screen as a condition of employmentMust provide full work availability from May 18, 2026 through August 7, 2026 and be able to work 40 hours per weekWhat We Offer Flexible work environment, allowing for hybrid work for positions/tasks that can be performed outside a HARMAN locationAccess to employee discounts on world-class Harman and Samsung products (JBL, HARMAN Kardon, AKG, etc.)Extensive training opportunities through our own HARMAN UniversityAccess to HARMAN Campus Fitness Center and CafeteriaAn inclusive and diverse work environment that fosters and encourages professional and personal developmentPay TransparencyFreshman: $21.00Sophomore: $23.00Junior: $25.00Senior: $27.00  Master: $32.00 Doct: $38.00Dependent on the internship offered, pay is based on factors, including without limitation, the applicant's level of education and
